data.name: Strikey Sisters
data.detailed_description:
More Games!

http://store.steampowered.com/app/491040/Bot_Vice/
http://store.steampowered.com/app/375120/Super_Star_Path/


About the Game

IMPORTANT NOTES!


- There is a "How To Play" section within the "Extras" menu! And also here.
- You need at least one gamepad in order to play the local 2 player co-op mode!

THE GAME


Say hello to a fantasy themed action arcade brick breaker! Featuring cute characters, powerful magic, crazy bosses, and even local 2 player co-op mode!

FEATURES


  • Action focused brick breaker game!
  • Local 2 player co-op mode (one gamepad needed).
  • No paddle - Instead, cute characters and better control of ball direction.
  • Travel the world map in the order you want.
  • Tons of different stages, enemies, patterns and bosses.
  • Useful player and ball power-ups... Oh, and several magic attacks!
  • Highly replayable! Uncover all the map, collect gems and unlock secret stages!
  • Polished and colorful pixel art visuals.
  • Catchy 90's synth-fantasy soundtrack.

STORY


Marie and Elene are sisters, and little witches! Today, their beloved pet, Sachiro, has been kidnapped by Lord Vanik's minions! Together, and with your help, they'll embark in a weird and wonderful journey in search of their missing pet, meeting (and fighting) odd and eccentric characters along the way.

So grab your pointy magic hat and hop into this unpretentious excuse for playing a fun arcade game!

CONTACT


A game by DYA Games.

data.short_description: Say hello to a fantasy themed action arcade brick breaker! Featuring cute characters, powerful magic, crazy bosses, and even local 2 player co-op mode!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Spanish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible 256MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 60 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.7+
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible 256MB VRAM
  • Storage: 60 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS or Debian based distro
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible 256MB VRAM
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
